jade.security.util
Interface SOCodec

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicSOCodec
public interface SOCodec

Interface used for encoding / decoding security objects

Version:
$Date: 2004-07-20 15:31:25 +0200 (mar, 20 lug 2004) $ $Revision: 452 $
Author:
Jerome Picault - Motorola
See Also:
SecurityObject, SecurityData

Nested Class Summary
static class SOCodec.CodecException
          This exception is thrown when some problem occurs in the concrete parsing subsystem accessed through this interface.
 
Method Summary
 SecurityData decode(byte[] data)
          Recovers a SecurityData object back from raw data, using the specific security object representation to interpret the byte sequence.
 byte[] encode(SecurityData so)
          Encodes a SecurityData object into a byte sequence, according to the specific object representation.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Query the name of the security object representation handled by this Codec object.
 

Method Detail

encode

byte[] encode(SecurityData so)
              throws SOCodec.CodecException
Encodes a SecurityData object into a byte sequence, according to the specific object representation.

Parameters:
so - The security object to encode.
Returns:
a byte array, containing the encoded security object.
Throws:
SOCodec.CodecException

decode

SecurityData decode(byte[] data)
                    throws SOCodec.CodecException
Recovers a SecurityData object back from raw data, using the specific security object representation to interpret the byte sequence.

Parameters:
data - The byte sequence containing the encoded message.
Returns:
A new SecurityData object, built from the raw data.
Throws:
SOCodec.CodecException - If some kind of syntax error occurs.

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Query the name of the security object representation handled by this Codec object.

Returns:
The name of the handled security object representation.
